meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 8, 2024 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Recruiting and Retention Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the recruiting and retention efforts for public safety personnel.

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and progress of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.title: Overview of the Enhancements to the Sexual Assault Investigation Process
agenda_items.description: Presentation on improvements made to the sexual assault investigation process.

agenda_items.title: Overview of Dallas Fire- Rescue Blood Transfusion Pilot Program
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the pilot program for blood transfusions in Dallas Fire-Rescue.
agenda_items.presenter: Scott Clumpner, Dr. Marshal Isaacs, Courtney Edwards

agenda_items.title: Overview of Public Safety Technology Projects
agenda_items.description: Update on various technology projects related to public safety.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Dashboards
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the public safety dashboards.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire Rescue Facility Construction Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the construction of Dallas Fire Rescue facilities.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire- Rescue Fleet Maintenance Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the maintenance of the Dallas Fire-Rescue fleet.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue Emergency Response Review Project Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the emergency response review project.

agenda_items.title: Police Academy Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the police academy operations.

agenda_items.title: Warrant Roundup Scheduled for February 2024
agenda_items.description: Information on the upcoming warrant roundup.

agenda_items.title: Sexually Orientated Business (SOB) Hours of Operation Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the hours of operation for sexually oriented businesses.

agenda_items.title: Ordinance Amending Chapter 7A, Anti-Litter Regulations
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending anti-litter regulations with a penalty clause.

agenda_items.title: Cooperative Purchasing Agreement for Mobile Forensic Software
agenda_items.description: Authorize a cooperative purchasing agreement for mobile forensic software.

financial_items.description: Cooperative purchasing agreement for mobile forensic software subscription for the Police Department.
Penalty for littering not to exceed.
